entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. 70 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
